item.description:
For Reiki Level III & Healing Practitioners! Receive this Attunement and Align with the amazing healing energy of Pleiadian Light Masters &
King Melchizedek

7pm, Tuesday, November 30

Held at Eternal Balance, Beverly MA
Limited to 8 participants!

Are you already a conduit for Divine Light? Would you like to "amp up" and have this magnificent energy flow through your channel with greater ease and power? Pleiadian Light Masters and King Melchizedek are passing an attunement through Helene that will attach you to their Divine healing energy and Light.
At this class you will receive:
- An attunement to connect and align with this powerful and Divine realm.
- A verse to call on their energy and connect with them instantly.
- A channeled message for the group.
- We will also participate in a healing circle to extend our healing Light to the Planet and the Universes.

These Divine Masters operate at a very high vibrational frequency. Your system must already be practiced in channeling Divine energy in order to comfortably receive this attunement.
In order to participate, you must:
- Already be a Healing Practitioner and / or Reiki Master (Level III).
- Have a brief intake appointment by telephone with Helene.

TO RESERVE: Please email Helene@AngelsLighthouse.com ( & Include your phone number!)

Take your healing to a new level! $125. Please pre-pay by Nov 27

QUESTIONS? Call Helene at 781-249-3730

Helene is an an experienced and well known Psychic Medium, Angel Communicator, and Reiki Master who teaches classes and appears at events in the area.
item.name: Pleiadian Light Masters & King Melchizedek
